pullrequest.title: Sonar sensors with a spherical collision shape

content.raw: It seems that the two possible values at the moment are `cone` and `sphere`. How about calling this field `geometry` instead? The first time I saw it, I thought it would be a mesh's URI. We've also been trying to document messages, mind adding a description which mentions the supported values?
content.html: It seems that the two possible values at the moment are cone and sphere. How about calling this field geometry instead? The first time I saw it, I thought it would be a mesh's URI. We've also been trying to document messages, mind adding a description which mentions the supported values?
